General.Name: Hail Cement Company
General.Description: Hail Cement Company engages in the production and distribution of cement and related products in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and internationally. The company provides ordinary Portland, sulphate resistant, and masonry cement. It also offers building materials and related accessories and derivatives; and trades in cement and building materials, as well as related accessories and derivatives. Hail Cement Company was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Hail, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Second Industrial City, Hail, Saudi Arabia
